about_the_game:
The Plot:

After find a powerful living crystal, the Kingdom of Fire began to rises. But this power carries with itself an curse, with time its was found an addiction that slowly disintegrated the bodies of those who lingered too close.

The King then, after find about the curse, decide to enslave the entire race of Greenins who had a natural aptitude with the crystals, due to them be born on the same forest.

Yet... Even with the slavery of the weaker, the kingdom couldn't resist to the curse of the crystals and began to fall. the crystals drove them to madness... death... leading the Kingdom to the catastrophe.

Features:

  • The combat is focused on being offensive, and punish your enemies whey they missing they attacks

  • Melee Combat, Skill Power, and Magic Spells, mixing weapon attack with skills to create better combo and strategies.

  • Environment with procedural elements that change in each run.

  • Play co-op or alone.

  • Create your own character, choose your style

  • Permanent Death for some npcs and some actions will carry to other paths.

  • Upgrade your level to get stronger and be able to use new skills

  • Purchase items with sellers and learn skills sorcerers and warriors.
